name: get_related_video_with_keywords
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_video_feature_summary.
Tool description: Contains TikTok && Douyin HD videos without watermark and user, post, music, search, feeds, comments, followers, and trends. And if you need any help you can send me private message or Email : labppabp@hotmail.com, Telegram (https://t.me/voyagell)

API description: Fetches a list of related videos based on the provided keywords from the TikTok API.

keywords.description: The search keywords to find related videos.

count.description: The number of videos to return. Defaults to '10'.

publish_time.description:
0 - ALL
1 - Past 24 hours
7 - This week
30 - This month
90 - Last 3 months
180 - Last 6 months

cursor.description: The cursor for pagination. Defaults to '0'.

region.description: The region to filter videos. Refer to the TikTok region list for details. Defaults to 'US'.
